use_trash_note: Move lists to the trash when deleting instead of permanently removing them.
use_trash_listitem_note:
Move list items to the trash instead of permanently removing them.
A separate trash bin is used for each list.
instock: Keep list items in the trash
instock_note: How long should old lists or list items be kept in the trash?
confirm_clearitemstrash:
Should the trashes be emptied?

Warning: The action can not be undone!
